name: Peter Carlson: PC Adventures
description:
In  this game you'll play as Peter Carlson, a computer who has been poorly programmed and can only perform actions (like jumping or dashing) in an endless loop. Each loop iteration decreases your health, and you'll have to start over again if your healthbar reaches zero.

Join one of the goofiest and cutest characters ever created in a short platformer and puzzle game about finding freedom!

How to play

Move your character around with A and D or with the keyboard arrows.

Use your action by pressing space. Your action will change upon use, following a loop pattern. Each time the loop is repeated, you'll lose a battery. Try to think before you act!
developers: Carlos Manuel Pozuelo - Pink shard games
